Title: Relates to banning the use of non-compostable produce stickers
Summary: Relates to banning the use of non-compostable produce stickers beginning January 1, 2024; provides civil penalties for violations; provides that fines shall be deposited into the environmental protection fund.
LawCode: Add Art 27 Title 33 §§27-3301 & 27-3303, En Con L; amd §92-s, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law and the state finance law, in relation to banning the use of non-compostable produce stickers
